column5: Any Montrealer's on this forum?  Moved here a few years ago and would love to meet some local anglers.  cheers,  Josh
Nope..none here,cept for that pesky dwarf.Wecome aboard. Joe
Isen't Mike the Pike from the Montreal area? - you should have no problem finding him on the water, here's a pic with his floater suit on:      LOL - sorry Mike!   Don

Yes there are some of us here .We have Roy,Marc Thorpe not to far away from good earth .Darsky is from MTL  Carll2 from the North Shore and Lunker Larry just next door.  I live 20 minutes from downtown Montreal in Saint-Hubert on the Southshore of the St-Lawrence River.  Drop me a PM JoshS  Tracker are you refering to this.         Mike the Pike
Watch out for those Quebecers... they aint Canadian!
So I see Dog you have been doing your homework and studying us Quebecers but don't you think that guy in the video well he really looks like you and he also has a heavy twisted accent
Yes Darren I enjoyed that too

I found the vid rather amusing!    ... and posted it hoping others would find the humor in it too, although I do realize that some folks may be "sensitive" and may not like it.   The Hoser-Frog in the vid and I may look similar because we wear glasses... but I don't own a "Kenora Dinner Jacket"... maybe I could borrow yours sometime???   ... btw... I had to watch the vid aboot a dozen times to understand aboot half of what he was saying, that "Paris Talk" plum evades me!!!

Well thanks for the replies, special thanks to you coach haha   .  I moved here from Toronto for school and have yet to do any shore fishing (as I am boatless).  It's been too long so soon I am going to have to start exploring the shorelines.  Can anybody send me in the right direction?  Josh
I can give you some spots Josh .  Do you have a car the Richelieu River also has great shore fishing.  MTP
Yep got the PM.  Appreciate the help Mike!
